snippet: Republicans, even House challengers, are distancing themselves from the proposed Medicare cuts in Paul D. Ryan’s budget plan, even as he and Mitt Romney urge them to embrace it.
abstract: Republican lawmakers and candidates are distancing themselves from Rep Paul D Ryan's budget plan, which helped make proposed Medicare changes and spending cuts a national issue.
lead_paragraph: Republicans, even House challengers, are distancing themselves from the proposed Medicare cuts in Paul D. Ryan’s budget plan, even as he and Mitt Romney urge them to embrace it.

headline.seo: Republican Troops Keeping Ryan’s Budget Plan at Arm’s Length
headline.main: Ryan’s Budget Proposal Is Pitting G.O.P. Troops Against Top of the Ticket
headline.print_headline: Ryan’s Budget Proposal Is Pitting G.O.P. Troops Against Top of the Ticket
